start_message: ⚡️ Zzzt! Ehy. I'm Rotom! My trainer merged me with a Telegram Bot. He's teaching me some commanzzz, for now I can tell you basic information about all Pokémon using /data command.
error1: ⚡️ Zzrrt! My trainer's teaching me many thingzz, but I still can't read in thought. Use this syntax: /data + PokémonName ex.: /data Rotom
error2: Mm-hmm, well, maybe he's an anime character, but he certainly izzn't a Pokémon. Zzzt-zzt! ⚡️
about: ⚡️ Zzt-zzz! Do you want some lore? Well, I'll give you some interesting links Rotomgram channel My trainer iszz writing a biography about me on @rotomgram Affiliate group I have a fan-page, too 😍 @pokemon_italia GitHub I'm completely open-source! https://github.com/alessiocelentano/Rotomgram Credits @alessiocelentano (bot, logo) pokemondb.net (data) pokemon.com (artworks)
